channel.title: Version 5.10 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.10.2 (2023-01-25) Fixes [bug] nav: fix breadcrumb for huge installations #446 5.10.1 (2023-01-25) Fixes [bug] print: fix image links with relative path #444 5.10.0 (2023-01-25) Enhancements [feature] shortcodes: support for accent color #440 [feature] shortcodes: add color parameter where applicable #438 [feature] theme: announce translations as alternate links #422 Fixes [bug] nav: fix breadcrumbs for deeply nested sections #442 [bug] theme: improve whitespacing in tables #441
